body.name: Delta Children 365 Plus Stroller - Lightweight Travel Stroller with Compact Fold, Iron
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins
features: EXTREMELY LIGHTWEIGHT: the ultimate in convenience, this lightweight stroller has a durable steel frame that only weighs 14.5 lbs.

COMPACT FOLD: This lightweight stroller with a compact umbrella fold & lock feature is ideal for travel or everyday use | Carry handle make transport easy | Folded Dimensions: 11”L x 12”W x 44”H | Meets theme park size requirements

SMOOTH RIDE: Swivel front wheels feature precision technology for outstanding control and effortless push, it’s easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface | Locking back brakes | Puncture-proof 6-inch tires are durable and shock absorbing
KEEPS KIDS & PARENTS COMFORTABLE: Stroller features an extendable canopy with UPF 50+ protection | 3 supported recline positions allows kids to sit, relax or sleep | Ergonomic leatherette handles

TONS OF STORAGE: Extra large storage basket keeps essentials within reach | Parent cup holder allows you to bring your water or coffee | SAFE CHOICE: JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by ASTM stroller | Features a 5-point safety harness | Assembled dimensions: 31.5”L x 20.7”W x 42.9”H | Recommended for 9 months up to 50 lbs.
body.description: Ideal for travel or everyday use, the 365 Plus Lightweight Stroller by Delta Children is the most convenient stroller for busy families! Extremely lightweight, this stroller weighs only 14.5 pounds and features a compact umbrella fold with a lockable design that ensures it stays closed as you're carrying it. An extra-large extendable canopy with UPF 50+ sun visor will protect your child from the elements and a footrest with calf support ensures baby is comfortable during walks, near and far. Built with the most advanced handling thanks to all-new puncture-proof wheels that feature precision technology, it’s easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface. Ergonomic leatherette handles make this stroller comfortable for parents to push. Some additional features of this lightweight stroller include: 5-point safety harness, extra-large storage basket and parent cup holder. This stroller is recommended for infants 9 months up to 50 pounds.Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality children's furniture affordable for all families. They know there's nothing more important than safety when it comes to your child's space. That's why all Delta Children products are built with long-lasting materials to ensure they stand up to years of use. Plus, they are rigorously tested to meet or exceed all industry safety standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lightweight stroller
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an easy lightweight stroller and this is it! The delta children stroller is exactly what I was looking for. It is easy to put together, took me less than 10 minutes and I love how easy to use it is. I wanted something I could pull in and out of the car with no hassle and this has been a lifesaver. Plus I love the features like the sun shade, cup holder and storage basket underneath! So happy with this find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this stroller! It’s so lightweight, easy to fold, love that it has the adjustable seat back, storage underneath, and a cup holder! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect travel stroller! Easy to set up, light weight, it reclines and the canopy extends well. The handle also has a great height!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size! Perfect to take anywhere. It fits Perfect in my small vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and compact
reviews.reviewText: I love how it's durable and of great quality. It is easy to assemble and fold together for quick storage. My son sat comfortably in the seat and the handles were easy to grip. I would recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy for travel!
reviews.reviewText: We used this stroller to run around Disney World and it was a game changer. Folded up very easy and wasn’t too heavy.

reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, sturdy, and easy to open and close.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this new lightweight compact stroller for on the go! I used to use the vista and hated how bulky and heavy it was to transport. Now I have this one that can pack up and go so easily without breaking me back!
